item.title: Gautam add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Guard well your spare moments. They are like uncut diamonds. Discard them and their value will never be known. Improve them and they will become the brightest gems in a useful life." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Gautam add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "I have found men who didn't know how to kiss. I've always found time to teach them." -- Mae West

item.title: Gautam add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Gautam add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Whatever you can do or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it!" -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Gautam add a quote by King Basil
item.description: "Be bold and mighty forces will come to your aide" -- King Basil

item.title: Gautam add a quote by Sidney Poitier
item.description: "I've learned that I must find positive outlets for anger or it will destroy me. There is a certain anger: it reaches such intensity that to express it fully would require homicidal rage--self destructive, destroy the world rage--and its flame burns because the world is so unjust. I have to try to find a way to channel that anger to the positive, and the highest positive is forgiveness." -- Sidney Poitier

item.title: Gautam add a quote by John W. Whitehead
item.description: "Children are the living messages we send to a time we will not see." -- John W. Whitehead

item.title: Gautam add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Gautam add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Gautam add a quote by Jennifer Rothschild
item.description: "The difference between bitter and better is I." -- Jennifer Rothschild
